attributes.title: This has unchristian content! So inappropriate 😡
attributes.review: I’d give it less if could. Horrible glitchy and then when I actually got to view the content. It was in appropriate and unchristian. I was so offended because my family loves Jesus and used to support trump. But now I feel he’s showing pornographic, satanic pictures to our children! My son is 17 so I let him dawnload! Horrible! Blasphemy! No body wants their child to see large orange bre*sts that look female on a man! I do not support this! Porno laten Bible burning satanic.

attributes.title: Emotional Distress
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app. I opened it to a picture of an orange martian in a suit. I was so traumatized I immediately started crying and shaking. I didn’t know it was possible for a person to look like that. There was no warning for disturbing imagery. When i tried to change the picture or make it go away it didn’t work. It took me an hour to calm myself down from my panic attack. -10/10 experience. I will be contacting my lawyer.

i had just got the app and as soon as i opened it i saw a a pineapple with white golden hair Squinting at me. i could tell it was very old it had wrinkles and saggy checks. my pet t. rex almost made all dino’s completely extinct🦖 when it saw it had fainted from the fumes from the fake tan. i showed my brother and sister and the hid under a bed in fear of the ugliness. my house almost fell down from the squinting pineapple with white golden hair. so this app has made every thing messed up.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!🤬
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep in touch with our beloved president since his twitter was getting boring and as soon as i downloaded the app AND SOME MAN BREAKS INTO MY HOUSE, he told me that i could live if i said “maga2020” and he brutally beat my family and i. i am DISGUSTED at the fact that i had to LIE in order to live 🤢. The trump administration really is trying to get their supporters to download this app?? WHEN I WENT THROUGH THIS??? UNACCEPTABLE!!!! DO NOT download this app if you don’t want this happening to you  😡

attributes.title: 🛑Cursed app🛑
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the big Cheeto🧀man was up to, and educate myself. But upon opening it, all the lights in my house turned off. I am freaking out right now. All I did was just open  the app and the lights turned off and I saw a Cheeto🧀 on the floor. I’m not sure what this means. Later on I went to try and delete the app, but this huge gust of wind blew🌪💨and closed and locked my doors. I’m seeing Cheetos🧀everywhere now. This app is cursed. Would give a zero.

attributes.title: Trump2020 (dead trump in 2020🥰)
attributes.review: Yes I do have a lot to help you out there I wcan wis wa a las mias was the first day in a while omg omg was the way I was going a day of Christmas and a birthday dinner and I wanna is the way you want to be with a man and a friend of a coral and you know you wanna was the day I was going a day or so maybe you can come and I wanna play with you and you have to come home with us so maybe you could just go and go get your stuff done so maybe I just got home I so periodt pohh 💁‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️✨🥰

attributes.title: Inappropriate Cheeto photos
attributes.review: Downloaded this app because Cheeto man told me to and I didn’t know there would be horrifying photos of Cheetos! I first opened the app and BAM there was a naked Cheeto on a horse and I was horrified. Why isn’t this app 18+?? What’s wrong with America? I feel awful for the children who weren’t warned. Little Cheeto man should be ashamed of himself. This app is terrible 0/10 would not recommend. Not fun. Not funny. I’m disappointed. I was expecting jokes but all I got were terrifying photos of Cheeto man. :(

attributes.title: DON’T BE FOOLED!! SO ORANGE!🍊
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app to support our president, the screen glitches out. It seemed strange but I continued and gave it my phone number. As SOON as I gave it my phone number, it spammed me with orange 🍊 emojis and blew up my phone! After the spamming finally stopped, my phone screen began to turn orange??? At first I thought night mode was glitching or something but it got really orange 😳 I recommend to NOT download this app even if your a trump supporter it’s just too much orange 🤦🏽‍♀️.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Horrible took 298 hours just to LOAD then when I used the app it said that it was just for straight white men and I was like that’s unfair then it said the more racist you are the more trump loves you and I was like this is crazy but it took me 16 days just to use the app and 49 months to finish setting it up just saying do not download is full of FAKE NEWS it’s a fake app 😌 just remember horrible service and would like to speak to a manager now - Karen and Manny2020 😘.

attributes.title: Horrible😔needs to be taken off the App Store
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support my favorite hot Cheeto 😍. I open the app to see this ugly hideous creature.🙈 I fainted cause of how scary and ugly it was 🤪. Then after a few days I kept on fainting and having weird things happen to me😞✨. I started to like Dixie’s song ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆. That’s when I knew the app had changed my life 😜 in a negative way 😢. I hate this app and has ruined my life ✨🧚💗
